action.description: The committee on HED recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Garrett, Amato, Evslin, Kapela, Kila, La Chica, Olds, Muraoka, Souza; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Sayama, Woodson.
